trans-unit.source: Provides methods used to render a tab control with visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于呈现选项卡控件以视觉样式的方法。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The TabRenderer class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a tab control with the current visual style of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: TabRenderer 类提供了一套`static`可以用于呈现一个选项卡上的操作系统的当前视觉样式的方法。

trans-unit.source: Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control.
trans-unit.target: 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 这很有用，如果您正在绘制应具有的当前的视觉样式的外观的自定义控件。

trans-unit.source: To draw a tab control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabPage%2A> method to draw the page, and use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabItem%2A> method to draw each tab.
trans-unit.target: 若要绘制选项卡控件，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabPage%2A>方法来绘制页上，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabItem%2A>方法，以便绘制每个选项卡。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, the methods of this class will draw the tab control with the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的工作区，此类的方法将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的选项卡控件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the methods and properties of this class will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 否则，方法与此类属性会引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the members of this class can be used, check the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否可以使用此类的成员，请检查的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class wraps the functionality of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=fullName> that is set to one of the elements exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Tab?displayProperty=fullName> class.
trans-unit.target: 此类包装<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=fullName>设置为其中一个元素由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Tab?displayProperty=fullName>类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Tab?displayProperty=fullName>公开</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer?displayProperty=fullName>的功能

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Draws a tab in the specified state and bounds.
trans-unit.target: 绘制具有指定的状态和边界选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法之前，应验证<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性返回`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the tab.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用于绘制选项卡。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the tab.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，指定在选项卡的边界。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TabItemState"></xref> values that specifies the visual state of the tab.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TabItemState"></xref>指定选项卡的可视状态的值。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统不支持视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: -or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
trans-unit.target: -或者-视觉样式禁用的操作系统中的用户。

trans-unit.source: -or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
trans-unit.target: -或者-视觉样式不应用于应用程序窗口的工作区。

trans-unit.source: Draws a tab in the specified state and bounds, and with an optional focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 绘制指定的状态和边界，以及可选的聚焦框的选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法之前，应验证<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性返回`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the tab.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用于绘制选项卡。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the bounds of the tab.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，指定在选项卡的边界。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to draw a focus rectangle; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要绘制聚焦框;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TabItemState"></xref> values that specifies the visual state of the tab.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.TabItemState"></xref>指定选项卡的可视状态的值。

trans-unit.source: The operating system does not support visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 操作系统不支持视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: -or- Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
trans-unit.target: -或者-视觉样式禁用的操作系统中的用户。

trans-unit.source: -or- Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.
trans-unit.target: -或者-视觉样式不应用于应用程序窗口的工作区。

trans-unit.source: Draws a tab in the specified state and bounds, and with the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 绘制指定的状态和边界，以及具有指定文本的选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法之前，应验证<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A>属性返回`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，指定在选项卡的边界。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to draw in the tab.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>若要在选项卡中绘制</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to `tabItemText`.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to `tabItemText`.

trans-unit.source: Draws a tab in the specified state and bounds, with the specified image, and with an optional focus rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 绘制在指定的状态和指定边界内的指定的图像，和一个可选焦点矩形的选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this method, you should verify that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.IsSupported%2A> property returns `true`.

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，指定的边界`image`。

trans-unit.target: -或者-视觉样式不应用于应用程序窗口的工作区。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer"></xref> class can be used to draw a tab control with visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer"></xref>类可以用于绘制选项卡控件以视觉样式。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabPage%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabItem%2A> methods will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`false`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabPage%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabItem%2A>方法将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer.DrawTabPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user has enabled visual styles in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用户已启用在操作系统中的视觉样式和视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口; 的工作区否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
